column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ At 11:15 pm on March 27
column7: there was a traffic accident between two vehicles.------Before the accident
column8: an unidentified Chinese man was driving a------Ford Ranger
column10: along the 95 Street in a westbound direction. Another Ford
column12: was driving along Highway 61 in the south-to-north direction and the the Chinese man’s car
column14: the two sides failed to come to an agreement
column15: and the police retained the vehicles for legal settlement. ------POST NEWS
